title: Nocturne - Quality of Life Change
body:
Hello everyone,

Just was thinking about Nocturne's E change back in 4.21.  I know this is rather late but with Nocturne now being more played because of the black cleaver changes, I noticed a few things...

1) His E-passive will only work with his own fear and Shacos... Because of Fiddlesticks change [4.3] his "fear" became a "flee", nocturne cannot speed up to an enemy affected by Fiddlestick's Q or Hecarim's R.

I believe since the act of making an opponent "flee" because of something terrifying should also proc his passive on his E.

2) The champion "bio" in client doesnt state he passively gains movement when moving towards a "feared" enemy.

I propose that Nocturne's E should apply to all fear/flee'd opponents... Just so more comps would work with him..

Just my 2cents

TSP FEAR

replies.body: Oh, nice catch, flee effects should definitely work with that passive. We'll get a change into an upcoming patch.

i think a better change would be having a range indicator to see how far an enemy needs to run to break the leash. had a few trades that i ran away from cause i didnt know they where still in range when they used their gap closer. kinda like morg's ult.
